summary: Replace the standard sneak animation with a crawling on fours animation
descriptionHtml:
Update : Added a new version more like catwoman that supports BBP.

Replace the standard sneak animation with a crawling on fours animation. This animation is designed initially for a female model.

To install just copy the content of the mod\'s data folder in your skyrim data folder it will add the necessary animation files.
To uninstall delete all the files that was contained in the mod\'s folder from your animations folder.
This mod won\'t be compatible with any other mod that modifies the sneak animations files.

Feel free to use this animation in any of your own mods as long as you credit me for my work.

Video: http://youtu.be/QTFajxxPSb0
author: DarkAngel1265
